alert.note: Alert for Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 3:52PM EST until January 25 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation is expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze, with the greatest amounts in the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Sussex County, New Jersey. * WHEN...Until 7:00 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Expect slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use extra caution if traveling. The latest road conditions for your state can be obtained by dialing 5 1 1.
